Authors

  • Michael Sumner. Author, maintainer.

  • Simon Wotherspoon. Contributor.
    RasterIO configuration for resampling options

  • Mark Padgham. Contributor.
    helped get started :)

  • Edzer Pebesma. Contributor.
    wrote the field-read handling, adapted here from sf

  • Roger Bivand. Contributor.
    wrote configure.ac, adapted here from rgdal

  • Jim Hester. Contributor, copyright holder.
    wrote CollectorList.h, copied here from fs package

  • Timothy Keitt. Contributor.
    wrote GetPointsInternal copied here from rgdal2 package

  • Jeroen Ooms. Contributor.
    tweaked build process, provided Windows build tools

  • Dale Maschette. Contributor.
    created the hex logo

  • Joseph Stachelek. Contributor.

  • Even Rouault. Contributor.
    primary author of the COG format and its use of the GDALwarp app-library, example code used by the warper function here

  • Robert Hijmans. Contributor.
    code in terra package used as example/inspiration

  • Dewey Dunnington. Contributor.
    wrote the columnar-access mode streaming Arrow support
